scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
scripts.build-debug: browserify src/simple-gallery.js -s SimpleGallery -t [babelify] -p [bannerify --file .banner ] -o dist/simple-gallery.js && sass scss/main.scss:dist/simple-gallery.css
scripts.build-min: uglifyjs dist/simple-gallery.js --comments '/!/' -m screw_ie8=true -c screw_ie8=true,unused=false -o dist/simple-gallery.min.js && sass scss/main.scss:dist/simple-gallery.min.css --style compressed
